we use 100,000 words from an English dictionill)' and 2.000.000.000 web pages as 
documems. it is a long search. W e need a shortcut. This matrix has to be compressed. 
I will now explain the SV O approach. which gives an optimal low rank approximation 
to A . (It works better for library matrices than for natural images.) Th ere is an everÂ·
